tool_description: Sales tax by zip code made easy and fast.
title: Simple TaxRate Retrieval

api_list.name: Tax Rate
api_list.description: Obtain tax rate by zip code
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://simple-taxrate-retrieval.p.rapidapi.com/api/ra/v1/tax_rate/{zipcode}"

headers = {
    "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
    "X-RapidAPI-Host": "simple-taxrate-retrieval.p.rapidapi.com"
}

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)

print(response.json())
